post.body:
In "Devara," directed by Koratala Siva, we explore the journey of a formidable sea warrior who bravely confronts the criminal activities plaguing his village. Years later, the narrative shifts to his mild-mannered son, who embarks on a path uniquely his own.

Our studio had the privilege of providing cutting-edge visual effects for this project, including the creation of a fully CG shark, enhancing the film's immersive experience.

<YouTube youTubeId="5cx7rvMvAWo" />
